text: 9.15 Lep 8.7-12 Agek, ensel anɨb ak ne ensel omɨŋal omɨŋal okok kɨlop wɨsɨb yokak. Taynen? God ne ensel anɨb okok kɨlop ned aglek, sub anɨb ak nep, takan anɨb ak nep, ñɨn anɨb ak nep, won anɨb ak nep kod yelɨgɨpal. Kod yelɨgɨpal ak nɨm, ñɨn anɨb ak apek, binɨb lum awl yelak okok day omɨŋal nokom tek agɨl, day omɨŋal tek yek, day nokom olap ñagɨnɨgel agɨl, wɨsɨb yokak.
